name: Monty's Egg Hunter
description:

  • Name of submission: Monty's Egg Hunter 4X Zero Prime Superior Version XG

==============================================================

The wicked Bunny King refuses to share his kingdoms eggs with the children. It's up to Monty with his Popeye like arms to save the day.
